title: The misuse shall be ascertained by physical site verification by a team of officers from the MCGM, which has approved the building plans
clause_text: The misuse shall be ascertained by physical site verification by a team of officers from the MCGM, which has approved the building plans.
section: Terms and Conditions for Buildings of Private Medical & Educational Institutions
